scripts.test-ci: yarn workspace @concordium/web-sdk run test-ci && yarn workspaces foreach --no-private --exclude @concordium/web-sdk run test
scripts.test:all: FORCE_COLOR=true yarn workspaces foreach --no-private run test --passWithNoTests
scripts.fmt:all: yarn prettier --write && yarn workspaces foreach --all -p run fmt
scripts.fmt-check:all: yarn prettier --check && yarn workspaces foreach --all -p run fmt-check
scripts.markdown:lint: markdownlint docs/README.md docs/pages/**/*.md packages/*/README.md examples/*/README.md README.md
scripts.markdown:linkcheck: markdown-link-check --config .markdown-linkcheck.json docs/README.md docs/pages/**/*.md packages/*/README.md examples/*/README.md README.md
scripts.build:all: FORCE_COLOR=true yarn workspaces foreach -vt --no-private run build
scripts.build-dev:all: FORCE_COLOR=true yarn workspaces foreach -vt --no-private run build-dev
scripts.clean:all: FORCE_COLOR=true yarn workspaces foreach -p --no-private run clean
